headline: Online Tip
subtitle: Dressed to the Nines
content:
It can be hard work finding the perfect ensemble to really make your character stand out, so we’ve done some of the hard work for you and put together some stylish outfits.

In any clothes store, head to the counter and ask the clerk to try some of these outfits on – there is one combined price for all items, so you can pick up a complete new look in a matter of seconds.

Outfits are stored in your apartment’s wardrobe for a fast costume change, whenever you feel like it.
